name: Olympic Team
description: Warrior Fortem, the prince of the Regnum kingdom, embarks on a dangerous journey to return to the king the demon-stolen artifact - the Scepter, a symbol of royal power. Paint Draw platformer adventure. Move to big world, kill all enemy and save you kingdoom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
